interface.name: Locatable
interface.javadoc:
A mirror that has a {@link Location}.
Robert Field
Gordon Hirsch
James McIlree
1.3

Returns the {@link Location} of this mirror, if there is executable code associated with it. Note that both Java<SUP><FONT SIZE="-2">TM</FONT></SUP> programming language methods and native methods have executable code. Returns null for abstract methods, since abstract methods have no executable code.
the {@link Location} of this mirror, or null if there is no executable code associated with it.
